title: PLEASE GIVE KLED A NEW SKIN!!!
body:
Now, its been eight whole months since everyone's favorite Cantankerous Cavalier was released, and we still don't have a new skin for him yet. As one who does not like his current skin, I am formally requesting a brand-spanking new skin.

Personally, I thought that an Omega Squad skin would have fit him perfectly. Give him a dark mustache, a cigar, new hat, medals of honor and some veteran-like new voice lines and *boom*. Add in a scarred and experienced-looking Skaarl, and it would have been absolutely perfect.

Obviously this didn't go through, but still. Did we need yet _another_ Fizz skin? Show our taco-loving Yordle and his cowardly yet loyal lizard some love. Please Rito, please....

replies.body: A Dragon Trainer Kled would be perfect as HELL.

I just don't think they can top the chocobo. Meetings for concepts probably go something like;

Person A: "How about Pool Party Kled where Skaarl is a pool floaty that pops and flies off when he runs away?"

Person B: "Thats cool, but he has a chocobo skin."

Person A: "Good point."

I doubt he will ever get a new skin.
I make a post about it and Pentakill Kled.
